welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Batavia, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving major domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving primarily domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving major domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
